markers.title: Data scan upgrade - Character challenges.
markers.description: Track to red brick is under the garbagecan.

markers.title: Data Scan Upgrade - Red Bricks
markers.description: From the middle Bridge Support, break the blue barrel to build a jumping platform that will allow you to reach the stud wall to climb up to the platform above. Run around the support beam to find a line, carefully walk out on the line until you reach the middle
under the bridge, use boat

markers.title: Ringtone - Gas
markers.description: on top of the building

markers.title: Super Drill Ride
markers.description: use rex fury
Use the security panel near the astronaut teleporter to gain access to the top floor of the Plaza building. Head around the glass hallway.

markers.title: Super Axe Smash
markers.description: use helicopter

markers.title: Fall Rescue
markers.description: Head to the greenhouse and use the teleporter to get inside
Climb to the rooftops near the playground until you reach the Jenny's Diner sign. Climb up the blue pole there, then pull the orange handle with Rex
hidden behind the platform that holds the Free Run token on top of the large building in the center of town. Run around behind it to collect the prize.

Find the drill spot on the outside ledge of the center bridge support column. Launch up from the water jet, then slowly work your way around the bridge support until you reach the top, free run across the ledges to the opposite side then glide down the rope.

markers.title: Super Ray Gun
markers.description: Take a boat around to the back of the Island to find a smaller Island with a large launch pad on it. Trigger all the switches to open the launch pad and jump down into the hole.

markers.title: Police Siren Hat
markers.description: From the beach teleport into the prison yard and head over to the tall guard tower where you will find a robber doorway

markers.title: Mario Hat
markers.description: On the island, climb the tall flap pole then slide over to the base of the statue. Slowly work your way around to the Teleport pad, traveling up to the top of the statue. Put out the fire then slide down from the torch top
on the roof
Pig is above you. To get to it you must get here by flying from the hangar
To get to this flag, you must get here using jetpack and chicken glide, starting from the bridge.
Use crowbar to get Athena
You'll get on the tower from near the flag on hangar
inside metro station

green
green
yellow and red

markers.title: Mayor Gleeson (Police)
markers.description: locked underneath a cage in the northeast. To blast it open head down the walkway toward the train station. Here a cannon will shoot a Bullet Bill from the Mario series at you. Lure the bullet back to the cage and jump out of the way at the last second.

markers.title: Vinnie Clown

markers.title: Doctor Jones
markers.description: Head to the east side of the area and use the wall-jumps to reach a handhold. From here, walk across a set of thin ledges and blue planks to reach a blue pipe. Climb up and head to the left until you see a tightrope and slide down it

markers.title: Royal Guard
